title: U.S. futures recover after Trump eases stance on China trade
text: U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Monday as U.S. President Donald Trump moved to ease trade tensions with China, soothing investor nerves after intense feuding between the world's top two economies last week sent stocks into a tailspin.

title: Global stocks edge higher as Trump acts to ease China trade tensions
text: Stock markets clawed themselves off their lows on Monday but sentiment remained fragile after the latest flare-up in the U.S.-China trade war sent investors scrambling into government bonds and battered emerging market currencies.

title: Trump says hopes doesn't have to consider tariffs on German cars
text: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that he and German Chancellor Angela Merkel discussed a trade deal with the European Union and said he hoped Washington would not have to consider imposing tariffs on German cars.

title: Stocks Swing, Bonds Climb Amid China Trade Salvos: Markets Wrap
text: Shares in Europe pared a decline while U.S. equity-index futures swung higher after President Donald Trump said China was willing to resume trade talks.

title: Asian shares skid as trade war deepens, fuels bond rush
text: Asian shares sank on Monday as the latest salvos in the Sino-U.S. trade war shook confidence in the world economy and sent investors steaming to the safe harbor of sovereign bonds and gold, while slugging emerging market currencies.

title: China says it will take 'more steps' to protect interests if U.S. enacts tariffs
text: China's said it is ready to take more steps to protect its interests if the United States moves ahead in enacting new tariffs.
